title: Parliament Highlights: Adhir Ranjan Chaudhary blames BJP for Kashmiri Pandit exodus; both Houses adjourned for the day - Deccan Herald
content:
1. Parliament Highlights: Adhir Ranjan Chaudhary blames BJP for Kashmiri Pandit exodus; both Houses adjourned for the day  Deccan Herald
  2. Parliament Live Updates: For 10 years nil defence procurement happened under UPA; from pin to aircraft was ordered: FM in Rajya Sabha  The Indian Express
  3. Lok Sabha live updates | Lok Sabha adjourned for the day  The Hindu
  4. Parliament budget session LIVE: Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha to resume today  Hindustan Times
  5. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Rajya Sabha has been adjourned till 11 am on Tuesday after returning the 'The Appropriation Bill, 2022.' Meanwhile, discussion regarding additional grants under the Ministry of Road Transport and Highways is under way in the Lok Sabha. Come back tomorrow for continued coverage.
